chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
k: nat
f: nat -> nat

Goal:
(forall i : nat, i < n -> divides k (f i)) -> divides k (∑ n f)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments divides (_ _)%nat_scope
binary_le_joins_inv : forall (m n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), m ≲ msum nat_join 0 n f -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = msum nat_join 0 k g /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}
sum_powers_binary_le_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = ∑ k (fun i : nat => g i * power (e (h i)) r) /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}
nat_double_joins_binary_le : forall (n m : nat) (f : nat -> nat -> nat) (g : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> exists k : nat, k < m /\ f i j ≲ g k) -> msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (f i)) ≲ msum nat_join 0 m g
sum_power_lt : forall (k n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), k <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < k) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power i k) < power n k
is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => divides r p /\ divides r q /\ (forall k : nat, divides k p -> divides k q -> divides k r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
power_decomp.power_decomp_is_digit : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> is_digit (∑ n (fun i0 : nat => a i0 * power (f i0) p)) p (f i) (a i)
power_decomp_is_digit : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> is_digit (∑ n (fun i0 : nat => a i0 * power (f i0) p)) p (f i) (a i)
is_lcm = fun p q r : nat => divides p r /\ divides q r /\ (forall k : nat, divides p k -> divides q k -> divides r k) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments is_lcm (_ _ _)%nat_scope
msum_sum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> m (f j) (g i) = m (g i) (f j)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => m (f i) (g i)) = m (msum m u n f) (msum m u n g)
power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp.power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp.power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_lt : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat) (q : nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < q) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) < power q p
power_decomp.power_decomp_lt : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat) (q : nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < q) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) < power q p
binary_le_sum_powers : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f g e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i ≲ g i)
sum_power_binary_lt_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> exists a : nat -> nat, m = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2)
is_rel_prime_div_r : forall p q k : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> divides p (k * q) -> divides p k
is_rel_prime_div : forall p q k : nat, is_gcd p q 1 -> divides p (q * k) -> divides p k
sum_0n_scal_r : forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat), ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * k) = ∑ n f * k
sum_0n_scal_l : forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat), ∑ n (fun i : nat => k * f i) = k * ∑ n f
sum_power_binary_lt : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r)
sum_powers_bound : forall (r n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), r <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) < power (e n) r
binary_le_sum_powers_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) -> {g : nat -> nat | m = ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i ≲ f i)}
divides_mult_inv : forall k p q : nat, k <> 0 -> divides (k * p) (k * q) -> divides p q
meet_sum_powers : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f g e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) ⇣ ∑ n (fun i : nat => g i * power (e i) r) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i ⇣ g i * power (e i) r)
sum_powers_ortho : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> e i = e j -> i = j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r)
sinc_injective : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> f i = f j -> i = j
nat_ortho_sum_join : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i <> j -> i < n -> j < n -> f i ⇣ f j = 0) -> ∑ n f = msum nat_join 0 n f
sum_0n_mono : forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i <= g i) -> ∑ n f <= ∑ n g
is_gcd_modulus : forall p q k r : nat, divides p k -> k <= q -> is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd p (q - k) r
double_sum_powers_ortho : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> f i j < r) -> (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 < i1 < n -> j2 < i2 < n -> e i1 j1 = e i2 j2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r)) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r))
binary_le_joins_inv' : forall (m n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), m ≲ msum nat_join 0 n f -> {g : nat -> nat | m = msum nat_join 0 n g /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i ≲ f i)}
divides_mult_r : forall p q k : nat, divides p q -> divides p (q * k)
divides_mult : forall p q k : nat, divides p q -> divides p (k * q)
is_gcd_moduplus : forall p q k r : nat, divides p k -> is_gcd p q r -> is_gcd p (q + k) r
nat_ortho_joins_left : forall (m n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), m ⇣ msum nat_join 0 n f = 0 < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> m ⇣ f i = 0)
nat_joins_binary_le_left : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (m : nat), msum nat_join 0 n f ≲ m < -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i ≲ m)
msum_ext : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> msum m u n f = msum m u n g
msum_only_one : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X) (i : nat), i < n -> (forall j : nat, j < n -> i <> j -> f j = u) -> msum m u n f = f i

``` 
intros i H.
intros j H0.
intros H1. 
unfold divides.
intros H2.
apply H.
exact H1.
Qed.
